metadata.topic_title: North American Electric Reliability Corporation (NERC) CIP

active_learning.discussion_prompt: Evaluate the balance between NERC CIP compliance costs and the risk of cyber-induced blackouts. Using real cases like the 2015 Ukraine grid attack, debate if current standards (e.g., CIP-005 ESP) are adequate or overly burdensome. Consider trade-offs in practicality vs. security.

Include partial truths that require deeper understanding
